title: Beautiful Salem 2 Bedroom
posting_body: For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>
Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!

Beautiful spacious 2 level, 2 bedroom, 1 bath luxury unit featuring open kitchen / living area w/ high ceilings, maple cabinets, black granite, hardwood floors throughout, central Heat/AC, This unit offers convenient in-unit washer/dryer, hot water and one outdoor parking space included in rent.
Located in the heart of Salem's Downtown near many great restaurants, bars, shops, Salem's waterfront, and The Peabody Essex Museum.
5 Minute walk to the commuter train station with only a 30-minute commute to Boston.
*First month's rent, last month's rent and 1/2 security deposit required.
